title: Opinions on new Call of Duty information?

replies.body:
The series has so much more potential than what people give it credit for, and the series itself already had a golden age (for me, at least) playing Call of Duty 2 and Call of Duty 3.

Also, I don't think Modern Warfare really needs a remaster. It's not worth the development time to add a few more pretty shaders and change some ground textures which 99% of all remasters do.

replies.body:
No offense, but Call of Duty was ALWAYS the same game every year.

The only game that introduced new things was CoD AW with the advanced parkour mechanics.

Given, the campaign is really well done with each game, especially modern warfare series and black ops.

But the multiplayer? Pfft. Run and shoot. Run and Shoot. Run. Shoot.

When will we be able to drive vehicles? I want to try out one of those vehicles that CoD has, the M1 Abrams or a T-90MS will do.

How about a jet like BO2 or Ghosts?
